courierServices.ContainerClasses

Class Employees

  • java.lang.Object
    • courierServices.ContainerClasses.Employees
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Employees
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class representing all employees. This class also implements Serializable interface for writing object to file.
    Author:
    Shubham Kumar
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static long EMPLOYEE_INITIALIZER
      Employee Initializer: Provides base (minimum) value for employee ID Also stores last created employee ID.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Employees()
      Constructor : Initialize arraylist to empty list

    • Field Detail

      • EMPLOYEE_INITIALIZER

        public static long EMPLOYEE_INITIALIZER
        Employee Initializer: Provides base (minimum) value for employee ID Also stores last created employee ID.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Employees

        public Employees()
        Constructor : Initialize arraylist to empty list

    • Method Detail

      • printListHeader

        public static void printListHeader()
        Prints table header, When list of all employees is printed as ToString this function prints table header.

      • addNewEmployee

        public long addNewEmployee()
        Add New Employee: Takes input from console and generates new Employee by adding newly created Employee class object to arraylist. New Employee ID is selected using static EMPLOYEE INITIALIZER variable, after creation EMPLOYEE INITIALIZER variable is incremented by 1.
        Returns:
        Employee ID of created Employee.

      • authenticateEmployee

        public EmpType authenticateEmployee(long empId,
                                    java.lang.String empPass)
        Checks whether details provided exists.
        Parameters:
        empId - - Employee ID
        empPass - - Password
        Returns:
        EmpType (Enum class)

      • copy

        public Employees copy(Employees object)
        Function to copy Employees object. It assigns arraylist of passed object to caller object.
        Parameters:
        object - - Employee object whose value to be equated
        Returns:
        this - in case of a condition a = b.copy(c);

      • printAllEmployees

        public void printAllEmployees()
        Prints all Employee details, with all details of single Employee in a single row. It calls ToString method of Employee class for every Employee.

      • removeEmployee

        public boolean removeEmployee(long empId)
        Removes employee from employees list by checking empId
        Parameters:
        empId - - Employee ID
        Returns:
        boolean value (true/false)
